channel.title: testing on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in testing on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Testing strategies in React
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Testing is essential for ensuring that your code works as expected, is maintainable, and doesn’t introduce bugs with future changes. React testing involves unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end (e2e) tests, each targeting different aspects of your application’s functionality.

item.title: Behavior Driven Development
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Behavior Driven Development (BDD) Three Practices First, take a small upcoming change to the system – a User Story – and talk about concrete examples of the new functionality to explore, discover and agree on the details of what’s expected to be done.

item.title: Remote Moderated Usability Testing
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Intro It’s a given that the Usability Test is one of the most fundamental undertakings in building a product, which assists with approving the product before launching, reducing effort, and money.

item.title: Fundamental End To End Frontend Testing With Cypress
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction End-to-end testing is a methodology used to test whether the flow of an application is performing as designed from start to finish.
